page.content: For an example of the daily work of a typical dairy farmer,who also runs a wholesale dairy delivery business,we visited a local farm,{Brookbottom {Farm,}owned by Mr.S.Fairclough. {4.00} milk delivery vans loaded {4.30 }cattle brought in for{milking {7.15 }milking operations finished cleaning milking area {8.00 }BREAKFAST {8.45 }bottling,feeding of livestock {11.00 }general farmwork {12.30}LUNCH {1.30 }general farmwork {3.30 }evening{milking,no bottling {6.00 }finishing farmwork and admin. The{farmer's day}ends at about 11.00pm He then snatches some rest ready to start once more when the alarm rings at 4.00am.This daily schedule goes on for seven days a week all through the year.
